Law and order should be the main priority of society even if it means limiting some freedoms
A strong and decisive leader can solve the country's problems better than democracy
Traditional and cultural values should be preserved and rapid social changes should be prevented
The government should have the authority to monitor citizens for national security
Respect for authority and hierarchy is essential for the proper functioning of society
Harsher punishments are a more effective way to reduce crime
Obedience and discipline are important values that should be taught to the younger generation
Preserving national and cultural identity is more important than accepting unlimited diversity
